welcome_message_body: Welcome to Shah Alam, Malaysia! Get ready to experience the unique blend of modernity and tradition in this charming city, known for its stunning mosques, vibrant markets, and delicious street food. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that Shah Alam has to offer.

restaurants.name: Restoran Temerloh Catering
restaurants.description: Restoran Temerloh Catering is a malay restaurant located in Shah Alam.
restaurants.address: Jalan Pahat J 15/J (Seksyen 15), 40200 Shah Alam, Selangor
